rev.comment: minor word change. I think this improves readibility
rev.diff:
Line 146: Line 146:
===Technical complexity===
===Technical complexity===
â
Although the default Bitcoin client is open source, some of its inner-workings are difficult (but not impossible) for independent programmers to review. Transactions are based on scripts that are contained inside the transactions and are to be executed to 'access the money'. While this increases flexibility of transactions, it does complicate the development of Bitcoin applications.<ref>{{cite web | url=https://forum.bitcoin.org/index.php?topic=4278.msg104751#msg104751 | title=What would you change about the Bitcoin protocol?|author=alkor}}</ref>
+
Although the default Bitcoin client is open source, some of its inner-workings are very difficult for independent programmers to review. Transactions are based on scripts that are contained inside the transactions and are to be executed to 'access the money'. While this increases flexibility of transactions, it does complicate the development of Bitcoin applications.<ref>{{cite web | url=https://forum.bitcoin.org/index.php?topic=4278.msg104751#msg104751 | title=What would you change about the Bitcoin protocol?|author=alkor}}</ref>
===Theft===
===Theft===
